body: So I wonder what logic will be used against me to justify this not getting the NTR tag! Other then "Shut up Vanilla Fag" or "blacklist it you FAG" despite the fact it's because it's not tagged properly that I'm here confused on why it wasn't! (And oh yeah for the "funny ones" the signs it's a NTR are NOT on the first page so fuck off with "it was painfully obvious" crap) Oh well whatever, I sure as I'm calling the "obviously not putting tags to trick people into NTR to claim it's popular!" All idiots here is "fart noises" to ignore anything that's inconvenient! (After all, can't claim "NTR is popular" unless you trick people into clicking it so then you can pad out the numbers! Makes me wonder how many "views" are genuine NTR lovers and how many were deceived into clicking?! NTR is going the way of a balloon when you put too much water in it! IT will get big, but it will explode and you'll just have all that gathered water wasted! "so hope it was worth protecting this bad behavior LOL)
